thread.title: Savannah Kolkaiewicz
thread.title_full: Merchant One reviewed by Savannah Kolkaiewicz

author: Savannah Kolkaiewicz
title: Savannah Kolkaiewicz
text: What I liked most about my call was - the representative, Gary, said to me, I will make sure we figure this out! I don't get that response a lot -- it's usually a "I'm not sure what happened" or "I cant explain this". Gary was very nice and I appreciated his help!
